programme.title: Pale Rider
programme.desc: A mysterious preacher protects a humble prospector village from a greedy mining company trying to encroach on their land.

programme.title: The Comancheros
programme.desc: A Texas Ranger (John Wayne) and a fugitive gambler (Stuart Whitman) stop white renegades running guns and liquor.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: A prison wagon carrying a condemned killer passes through North Fork.

programme.title: The Gene Autry Show
programme.desc: Gene faces unexpected danger while investigating a smuggling ring operating on the Mexican border.

programme.title: The Gene Autry Show
programme.desc: Gene tries to clear false charges against an old Gypsy and his daughter.

programme.title: The Gene Autry Show
programme.desc: Gene tries to protect a visiting dignitary from assassination.

programme.title: The Gene Autry Show
programme.desc: Gene and Pat are kidnapped, and Pat feigns amnesia long enough for Gene to formulate an escape plan.

programme.title: The Gene Autry Show
programme.desc: Banker Ben Tansey fails to show up at work, and the townsfolk fear he has stolen their money.

programme.title: The Gene Autry Show
programme.desc: Gene uncovers a crooked depot agent and his henchmen hijacking payroll shipments from the railroad.

programme.title: The Gene Autry Show
programme.desc: Hairdresser Corinne Sheldon instructs two hired gunmen of the whereabouts of the townspeoples' valuables.

programme.title: The Gene Autry Show
programme.desc: Archaeologists find a valuable Spanish cross which an Eastern confidence man plots to steal and hold for ransom.

programme.title: Zorro's Fighting Legion
programme.desc: The masked avenger forms an army to protect Mexican gold shipments.

programme.title: The Outrage
programme.desc: A Mexican bandit (Paul Newman), a victim (Claire Bloom), an Indian and a prospector have different versions of a rape/murder.

programme.title: The Moonlighter
programme.desc: A cattle herder/rustler (Fred MacMurray) escapes from a lynch mob but surrenders to his ex-girlfriend (Barbara Stanwyck).

programme.title: Devil's Canyon
programme.desc: An outlaw woman (Virginia Mayo) helps one Arizona convict (Dale Robertson) stop another (Stephen McNally) with a Gatling gun.

programme.title: City of Bad Men
programme.desc: An outlaw (Dale Robertson) and his partners plan to rob the gate at the 1897 Corbett-Fitzsimmons fight in Carson City, Nev.

programme.title: Dakota Incident
programme.desc: Indians trap a bank robber (Dale Robertson), a beauty (Linda Darnell), a bank clerk (John Lund) and other stagecoach passengers in a gully.

programme.title: Law of the Lawless
programme.desc: A gunfighter-turned-judge faces trouble from an old friend after he sentences the man's son to death.
